attributes.title: Colgate Toothpaste
attributes.description: All Colgate people are part of a global team, committed to working together across countries and throughout the world. Only by sharing ideas, technologies and talents can the Company achieve and sustain profitable growth.
Indo Gulf Co. offers a vast selection of Colgate toothpastes, and brushes, Pepsodent Brushes ,Oral-B Brushes, and a variety of soaps.
attributes.title: Indo Gulf Co

attributes.description: Guangzhou Yishimei Daily Chemical Co., Ltd. was established in 1999, mainly engaged in producing commodities, such as toothpastes, soaps and shampoos. With more than ten years' experience, they have been one of the main commodity manufacturers in Guangzhou. Specializing in the commodities, we have strong technical force, advanced equipment and technology and a quality control system. Their sophisticated equipment ensures that all of our products are manufactured in line with international quality standards.
attributes.title: Guangzhou Yishumei Daily Chemical Co

attributes.description: The video below shows Colgate Palmolive initiative to bring clean drinking water and sanitation to the people of Guatemala

Fameco Group, LLC, Nevada USA
attributes.description: Distributor and Wholesaler of a wide range of house hold detergents, oral care, shampoos, conditioners, Diapers and soaps.

attributes.title: FMCG Viet Co., Ltd
attributes.address: Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
attributes.description:
FMCG is an Exporter, Trading Company and Wholesaler
Their current export markets are:
•	North America
•	Mid East/Africa

attributes.title: Diversey, Inc
attributes.description: Diversey is a leading brand of sustainable cleaning, sanitation and hygiene solutions. As a part of Sealed Air, Diversey branded products are helping create a new global leader in food safety and security, facility hygiene and product protection. With offices in more than 60 locations around the world, Diversey's global reach allows us to serve our customers closest to where they do business. THis includes America, Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the greater Asia Pacific.

attributes.title: New Age Beauty Mart. Inc
North America Markets
attributes.description: This product is distributed across North America. Following this, regional distributors and wholesalers buy products from manufacturing factories.

attributes.title: Procter & Gamble
attributes.description:
Procter & Gamble Purpose:
We will provide branded products and services of superior quality and value that improve the lives of the world’s consumers, now and for generations to come. As a result, consumers will reward us with leadership sales, profit and value creation, allowing our people, our shareholders and the communities in which we live and work to prosper.

attributes.title: UniLever Ltd – Unilever pic
attributes.address: City of London, Greater London, UK
attributes.description:
Colgate Is Possible $55 Billion Unilever Target, UniCredit Says
By Clementine Fletcher - Feb 8, 2011 7:36 AM ET

"Unilever, the world’s second-largest consumer-goods company, should seek to acquire Colgate-Palmolive Co. to boost sales growth in emerging markets and expand its personal-care unit, according to analysts at UniCredit SpA."

http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2011-02-08/colgate-is-possible-55-billion-unilever-target-unicredit-says.html

attributes.description: Pentor is an exporter, distributor, wholesaler, and importer. This company purchases all kinds of products, such as our featured colgate toothpaste, Oral – B tooth brushes, razors, Gillette products, shampoos etc.
